creditline: Gift of Jill Bonovitz and Nancy Hellebrand in honor of their mother, Janet Fleisher
description: stylized drawing of pink-skinned girl with orange hair wearing a yellow dress with red and green half-circle patterns on skirt, magenta stockings and purple shoes, standing on water at center, with a standing brown-skinned man wearing a yellow shirt, purple pants and purple hat behind a black stepped element behind girl (on boat or far shore?); red-orange half-circle (setting sun?) at left; blue water with rows on white curved lines; one white football-shaped cloud; black and orange borders
inscription: on back in pencil: 1106 | on back in pencil: EA 77
provenance: Janet Fleisher Investment Corp., Philadelphia; given to MIA, 2016.
signed: on back in pencil: Eddie Arning
title: Girl in Water
